short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts ASINs from Amazon product pages and allows copying them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon ASIN Extractor

The Amazon ASIN Extractor extension helps you quickly and easily extract ASINs (Amazon Standard Identification Numbers) from any Amazon product page. With just a single click, this tool retrieves all ASINs on the page, along with product images, and presents them in a clean, easy-to-read format.

Key Features:
Extract ASINs: Automatically detect and extract ASINs from Amazon product pages, including bestseller lists and search results.
Visual Display: View product images alongside their corresponding ASINs for easy identification.
Copy ASINs: Copy all extracted ASINs to your clipboard with a single click, perfect for research, marketing, or inventory management.
User-Friendly Interface: Modern, clean design with a responsive layout thatâ€™s easy to navigate.
Seamless Integration: Works across all Amazon product pages, including local Amazon stores like Amazon.es.
Perfect for e-commerce professionals, marketers, and Amazon sellers who need to work with product ASINs quickly and efficiently.
